org.springframework.web.reactive.handler

类 WebFluxResponseStatusExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.server.handler.ResponseStatusExceptionHandler
      • org.springframework.web.reactive.handler.WebFluxResponseStatusExceptionHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WebExceptionHandler

    public class WebFluxResponseStatusExceptionHandler
extends ResponseStatusExceptionHandler
    Common WebFlux exception handler that detects instances of ResponseStatusException (inherited from the base class) as well as exceptions annotated with @ResponseStatus by determining the HTTP status for them and updating the status of the response accordingly.

    If the response is already committed, the error remains unresolved and is propagated.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0.5
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller, Rossen Stoyanchev

      • determineStatus

        @Nullable
protected HttpStatus determineStatus(java.lang.Throwable ex)
        从类复制的说明: ResponseStatusExceptionHandler
        Determine the HTTP status implied by the given exception.
        覆盖:
        determineStatus 在类中 ResponseStatusExceptionHandler
        参数:
        ex - the exception to introspect
        返回:
        the associated HTTP status, if any
